column3: Edge of Insanity is the first studio album by guitarist Tony MacAlpine
column4: released in 1986 through Shrapnel Records. In a 2009 article by Guitar World magazine
column5: the album was ranked fourth in the all-time top ten list of shred albums.[3] On some reissues
column6: "Empire in the Sky" is split into two tracks
column7: with the introduction section on track five.
